title: Hyperbole & Understatement Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of literary extremes, from wild exaggeration to deliberate understatement

questions.question: What is 'hyperbole'?
options: An extreme exaggeration used for emphasis or effect, not meant literally
A factual statement backed by evidence

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of hyperbole?
options: I've told you a million times

questions.question: What is 'understatement'?
options: A statement written under another statement
Presenting something as less important, serious, or significant than it actually is
A summary at the bottom of a page

What is 'litotes,' a specific form of understatement?
options: An affirmative statement made by negating its opposite, such as 'not bad' meaning 'good'
